spell_tooltip.description: While Obsidian Scales is active you gain immunity to interrupt, silence, and pushback effects.
Hover makes you immune to movement speed reduction effects.
Fire Breath burns away 1 beneficial Magic effect per empower level from all targets.
Conjure a path of shifting stone towards the target location, rooting enemies for 15 sec. Damage may cancel the effect.
Conjure a path of shifting stone towards the target location, rooting enemies for 15 sec. Damage may cancel the effect.
Reinforce your scales, reducing damage taken by 30%. Lasts 12 sec.
Expunge toxins affecting an ally, removing all Poison effects.
Disintegrate channels 20% faster.
Fly to an ally and heal them for 558,663, or heal yourself for the same amount.
Essence regenerates 10% faster.
Living Flame deals 6% more damage and healing.
Store 20% of your effective healing, up to 171,074. Your next damaging Living Flame consumes all stored healing to increase its damage dealt.
Interrupt an enemy's spellcasting and prevent any spell from that school of magic from being cast for 4 sec.
Hover increases your movement speed by 70% for the first 4 sec.
Your Magic damage done is increased by 4%.
Compress time to make your next empowered spell cast instantly at its maximum empower level.
Your Leech is increased by 4%.
Magic damage taken reduced by 16%.
Your Stamina is increased by 8%.
Hover lasts 4 sec longer.
Fire Breath's damage over time lasts 4 sec longer.
While above 75% health, your movement speed is increased by 10%.
The flames of life surround you for 8 sec. While this effect is active, 100% of damage you take is healed back over 8 sec.
Emerald Blossom and Verdant Embrace instantly heal you for 139,220 when cast.
Sunder an enemy's protective magic, dealing 902,150 Spellfrost damage to absorb shields.
Azure Strike damages 1 additional enemy.
Renewing Blaze's cooldown is reduced by 30 sec.
Redirect your excess magic to a friendly healer for 1 hour. When you cast an empowered spell, you restore 0.25% of their maximum mana per empower level. Limit 1.
Fire Breath causes your next Living Flame to strike 1 additional target per empower level.
Hover gains 1 additional charge.
Source of Magic increases the target's healing and damage done by 3%.
Deep Breath stuns enemies for 3 sec.
Lob a ball of flame, dealing 210,497 Fire damage to the target and nearby enemies.
Your Living Flame has a 20% chance to cause an Essence Burst, making your next Disintegrate or Pyre cost no Essence.
Azure Strike has a 15% chance to cause an Essence Burst, making your next Disintegrate or Pyre cost no Essence.
Pyre's Essence cost is reduced by 1.
Quell's cooldown is reduced by 20 sec.

Focus your energies to release a salvo of pure magic, dealing 815,969 Spellfrost damage to an enemy. Damages additional enemies within 25 yds when empowered.

I:   Damages 2 enemies.

II:  Damages 4 enemies.

III: Damages 6 enemies.
Pyre has a 30% chance to flare up and explode again on a nearby target.
Increases your maximum Essence to 6.

Erupt with draconic fury and exhale Pyres at 3 enemies within 25 yds.

For 18 sec, Essence Burst's chance to occur is increased to 100%, and you gain the maximum benefit of Mastery: Giantkiller regardless of targets' health.
Disintegrate deals 16% more damage.
Living Flame deals 25% increased damage and healing, but its cast time is increased by 0.3 sec.
Casting an empower spell extends the duration of Dragonrage by 5 sec, up to a maximum of 20 sec.
Essence Burst stacks 2 times.
Fire Breath deals 30% more damage.
Azure Strike and Living Flame deal 20% more damage.
Eternity Surge and Shattering Star hit twice as many targets.
While channeling Disintegrate your Fire Breath on the target deals damage 100% more often.
During Deep Breath and Dragonrage you gain the maximum benefit of Mastery: Giantkiller regardless of targets' health.
Fire Breath damage has 16% chance to cause your next Living Flame to be instant cast, stacking 2 times.
Deep Breath's cooldown is reduced by 1 min.
Your damaging critical strikes deal 230% damage instead of the usual 200%.
Deep Breath reduces the Essence costs of Disintegrate and Pyre by 1 and increases their damage by 10% for 12 sec after you land.
Your empower spells' maximum level is increased by 1, and they reach maximum empower level 20% faster.
Essence Burst increases the damage of affected spells by 15.0%.
Casting an empower spell increases your Essence regeneration rate by 100% for 4 sec.

Disintegrate reduces the remaining cooldown of your empower spells by 0.50 sec each time it deals damage.

Pyre reduces the remaining cooldown of your empower spells by 0.40 sec per enemy struck, up to 2.0 sec.
Engulf your target in dragonflame, damaging them for 581,372 Fire or healing them for 545,298. For each of your periodic effects on the target, effectiveness is increased by 50%.
Hover and Deep Breath travel 40% faster, and Hover travels 40% further.
Engulf reduces the cooldown of Fire Breath by 6 sec.
Essence abilities are enhanced with Flame, dealing 20% of healing or damage done as Fire over 8 sec.
Critical strike chance against targets above 50% health increased by 15%.
Engulf quickens your pulse, reducing the cast time of your next spell by 30%. Stacks up to 2 charges.
Fire Breath deals its damage in 20% less time.
Living Flame and Azure Strike have 1 extra chance to trigger Essence Burst when they critically strike.
Engulf gains 1 additional charge and deals 20% increased damage and healing.
Renewing Blaze also applies to your target or 1 nearby injured ally at 50% value.
Engulf consumes 2 sec of Fire Breath from the target, detonating it and damaging all nearby targets equal to 900% of the amount consumed, reduced beyond 5 targets.
Conjure a path of shifting stone towards the target location, rooting enemies for 15 sec. Damage may cancel the effect.
Conjure a path of shifting stone towards the target location, rooting enemies for 15 sec. Damage may cancel the effect.
Reinforce your scales, reducing damage taken by 30%. Lasts 12 sec.
Expunge toxins affecting an ally, removing all Poison effects.
Disintegrate channels 20% faster.
Wing Buffet's cooldown is reduced by 2 min.
Fly to an ally and heal them for 558,663, or heal yourself for the same amount.
Essence regenerates 10% faster.
Living Flame deals 6% more damage and healing.
Interrupt an enemy's spellcasting and prevent any spell from that school of magic from being cast for 4 sec.
Tail Swipe's cooldown is reduced by 2 min.
Hover increases your movement speed by 70% for the first 4 sec.
Casting Emerald Blossom or Verdant Embrace reduces the cast time of your next Living Flame by 40%.
Your Magic damage done is increased by 4%.
Compress time to make your next empowered spell cast instantly at its maximum empower level.
Your Leech is increased by 4%.
Magic damage taken reduced by 16%.
Your Stamina is increased by 8%.
Hover lasts 4 sec longer.
Fire Breath's damage over time lasts 4 sec longer.
While above 75% health, your movement speed is increased by 10%.
The flames of life surround you for 8 sec. While this effect is active, 100% of damage you take is healed back over 8 sec.
Emerald Blossom and Verdant Embrace instantly heal you for 139,220 when cast.
Sunder an enemy's protective magic, dealing 928,293 Spellfrost damage to absorb shields.
Azure Strike damages 1 additional enemy.
Renewing Blaze's cooldown is reduced by 30 sec.
Redirect your excess magic to a friendly healer for 1 hour. When you cast an empowered spell, you restore 0.25% of their maximum mana per empower level. Limit 1.
Fire Breath causes your next Living Flame to strike 1 additional target per empower level.
Source of Magic increases the target's healing and damage done by 3%.
Lob a ball of flame, dealing 211,786 Fire damage to the target and nearby enemies.
Your Living Flame has a 20% chance to cause an Essence Burst, making your next Disintegrate or Pyre cost no Essence.
Azure Strike has a 15% chance to cause an Essence Burst, making your next Disintegrate or Pyre cost no Essence.
Pyre's Essence cost is reduced by 1.
Quell's cooldown is reduced by 20 sec.

Focus your energies to release a salvo of pure magic, dealing 815,218 Spellfrost damage to an enemy. Damages additional enemies within 25 yds when empowered.

I:   Damages 2 enemies.

II:  Damages 4 enemies.

III: Damages 6 enemies.
Increases your maximum Essence to 6.

Erupt with draconic fury and exhale Pyres at 3 enemies within 25 yds.

For 18 sec, Essence Burst's chance to occur is increased to 100%, and you gain the maximum benefit of Mastery: Giantkiller regardless of targets' health.
Disintegrate deals 16% more damage.
Living Flame deals 25% increased damage and healing, but its cast time is increased by 0.3 sec.
Casting an empower spell extends the duration of Dragonrage by 5 sec, up to a maximum of 20 sec.
Essence Burst stacks 2 times.
Fire Breath deals 30% more damage.
Azure Strike and Living Flame deal 20% more damage.
Eternity Surge deals 15% increased damage to your primary target.
While channeling Disintegrate your Fire Breath on the target deals damage 100% more often.
During Deep Breath and Dragonrage you gain the maximum benefit of Mastery: Giantkiller regardless of targets' health.
Exhale bolts of concentrated power from your mouth at 2 enemies for 229,223 Spellfrost damage that cracks the targets' defenses, increasing the damage they take from you by 20% for 4 sec.
Fire Breath damage has 16% chance to cause your next Living Flame to be instant cast, stacking 2 times.
Your damaging critical strikes deal 230% damage instead of the usual 200%.
Shattering Star's damage taken effect lasts 2 sec longer.
Your empower spells' maximum level is increased by 1, and they reach maximum empower level 20% faster.
Essence Burst increases the damage of affected spells by 15.0%.
Disintegrate ticks 1 additional time, but deals 10% less damage.
Casting an empower spell increases your Essence regeneration rate by 100% for 4 sec.

Disintegrate reduces the remaining cooldown of your empower spells by 0.50 sec each time it deals damage.

Pyre reduces the remaining cooldown of your empower spells by 0.40 sec per enemy struck, up to 2.0 sec.
Disintegrate has a 15% chance each time it deals damage to launch a level 1 Eternity Surge at 40% power.
Hover and Deep Breath travel 40% faster, and Hover travels 40% further.
Engulf reduces the cooldown of Fire Breath by 6 sec.
Essence abilities are enhanced with Flame, dealing 20% of healing or damage done as Fire over 8 sec.
Critical strike chance against targets above 50% health increased by 15%.
Engulf quickens your pulse, reducing the cast time of your next spell by 30%. Stacks up to 2 charges.
Fire Breath deals its damage in 20% less time.
Living Flame and Azure Strike have 1 extra chance to trigger Essence Burst when they critically strike.
Engulf gains 1 additional charge and deals 20% increased damage and healing.
Your wounds have a small chance to cauterize, healing you for 30% of damage taken. Occurs more often from attacks that deal high damage.
Engulf consumes 2 sec of Fire Breath from the target, detonating it and damaging all nearby targets equal to 900% of the amount consumed, reduced beyond 5 targets.
Conjure a path of shifting stone towards the target location, rooting enemies for 15 sec. Damage may cancel the effect.
Conjure a path of shifting stone towards the target location, rooting enemies for 15 sec. Damage may cancel the effect.

Sunder an enemy's protective magic, dealing 911,673 Spellfrost damage to absorb shields.
Azure Strike damages 1 additional enemy.

I:   Damages 2 enemies.

II:  Damages 4 enemies.

III: Damages 6 enemies.
Pyre has a 30% chance to flare up and explode again on a nearby target.
Increases your maximum Essence to 6.

Engulf gains 1 additional charge and deals 20% increased damage and healing.
Renewing Blaze also applies to your target or 1 nearby injured ally at 50% value.
Engulf consumes 2 sec of Fire Breath from the target, detonating it and damaging all nearby targets equal to 900% of the amount consumed, reduced beyond 5 targets.

Verdant Embrace tethers you to an ally, increasing movement speed by 40% and slowing and siphoning 100,722 life from enemies who come in contact with the tether.

The tether lasts up to 10 sec or until you move more than 30 yards away from your ally.
Deep Breath forms curtains of fire, preventing line of sight to enemies outside its walls and burning enemies who walk through them for 580,164 Fire damage. Lasts 6 sec.
Reinforce your scales, reducing damage taken by 30%. Lasts 12 sec.
Expunge toxins affecting an ally, removing all Poison effects.
Expunge toxins affecting an ally, removing all Poison effects.
Wing Buffet's cooldown is reduced by 2 min.
Fly to an ally and heal them for 558,663, or heal yourself for the same amount.
Essence regenerates 10% faster.
Living Flame deals 6% more damage and healing.
Store 20% of your effective healing, up to 171,074. Your next damaging Living Flame consumes all stored healing to increase its damage dealt.
Interrupt an enemy's spellcasting and prevent any spell from that school of magic from being cast for 4 sec.
You may reactivate Deep Breath within 3 sec after landing to travel back in time to your takeoff location.
Tail Swipe's cooldown is reduced by 2 min.
Hover increases your movement speed by 70% for the first 4 sec.
Cauterize an ally's wounds, removing all Bleed, Poison, Curse, and Disease effects. Heals for 271,177 upon removing any effect.
Casting Emerald Blossom or Verdant Embrace reduces the cast time of your next Living Flame by 40%.
Your Magic damage done is increased by 4%.
Compress time to make your next empowered spell cast instantly at its maximum empower level.
Your healing done and healing received are increased by 6%.
Your Leech is increased by 4%.
Magic damage taken reduced by 16%.
Your Stamina is increased by 8%.
Hover lasts 4 sec longer.
Emerald Blossom heals 2 additional allies.
Fire Breath's damage over time lasts 4 sec longer.
Emerald Blossom and Verdant Embrace instantly heal you for 139,220 when cast.
Green spells restore 10% more health.
Redirect your excess magic to a friendly healer for 1 hour. When you cast an empowered spell, you restore 0.25% of their maximum mana per empower level. Limit 1.
Source of Magic increases the target's healing and damage done by 3%.
Wrap an ally with temporal energy, healing them for 106,921 and causing your next healing spell to cast an additional time on that ally at 70% of normal healing. Essence spells cannot be Echoed.

Inhale, gathering the power of the Dream. Release to exhale, healing yourself and 5 injured allies in a 30 yd cone in front of you for 372,350.

I:   Heals 68,429 instantly and 303,920 over 16 sec.

II:  Heals 144,409 instantly and 227,940 over 12 sec.

III: Heals 220,389 instantly and 151,960 over 8 sec.

Reverse an ally's injuries, healing them for 202,925 over 12 sec.

When Reversion critically heals, its duration is extended by 2 sec, up to a maximum of 12 sec.
Each cast of a Bronze spell causes your next empower spell to reach maximum level in 10% less time, stacking up to 4 times.
Living Flame has a 20% chance, and Reversion has a 15% chance to make your next Essence ability free. Stacks 2 times.

Rewind 33% of damage taken in the last 5 seconds by all allies within 40 yds. Always heals for at least 151,796.

Healing increased by 100% when not in a raid.

Divert spiritual energy, healing an ally for 661,773. Jumps to injured allies within 30 yds when empowered.

I:   Heals one ally.

II:  Heals a second ally.

III: Heals a third ally.
Essence Burst stacks 2 times.

Commune with the Emerald Dream, restoring 20% health and 2% mana every 0.9 sec for 4.5 sec. Overhealing is transferred to an injured ally within 40 yds.

Castable while stunned, disoriented, incapacitated, or silenced.
Spiritbloom's cooldown is reduced by 10 sec.
Emerald Blossom sends out flying seedlings when it bursts, healing 2 allies up to 40 yds away for 69,231.
Your empower spells' maximum level is increased by 1.
Reversion instantly heals the target for 15% of damage taken in the last 5 sec.
You are able to move while communing with the Dream.
Each time you gain Essence Burst, your critical heals are 230% effective instead of the usual 200% for 10 sec.
Gain a 30% chance for one of your Fluttering Seedlings to grow into a new Emerald Blossom.
Increases your maximum Essence to 6.
Verdant Embrace increases the healing of your next Dream Breath by 40%, or your next Living Flame by 100%.
Verdant Embrace temporarily bonds your life with an ally, causing your healing on either partner to heal the other for 40% of the amount. Lasts 5 sec.
Fire Breath heals 5 nearby injured allies for 80% of damage done to up to 5 targets, split evenly among them.
Rewind's cooldown is reduced by 60 sec.
Dream Breath healing is increased by 30%.
Living Flame and Fire Breath deal additional damage and healing equal to 2.0% of your maximum health.
Reversion, Time Dilation, Echo, and Temporal Anomaly last 30% longer and cost 30% less mana.

Take in a deep breath and fly to the targeted location, healing all allies in your path for 213,842 immediately, and 149,870 over 15 sec.

Healing increased by 100% when not in a raid.

Removes all root effects. You are immune to movement impairing and loss of control effects while flying.
Every 3 Emerald Blossoms leaves behind a tiny sprout which gathers 10% of your healing over 8 sec. The sprout then heals allies within 30 yds, divided evenly among targets.

Hover now causes you to briefly warp out of existence and appear at your destination. Hover's cooldown is also reduced by 5 sec.

Hover continues to allow Evoker spells to be cast while moving.
Tip the Scales overloads you with temporal energy, increasing your haste, movement speed, and cooldown recovery rate by 30%, decreasing over 30 sec.
Upheaval deals 50% additional damage over 8 sec.
Warp leaves a trail of Motes of Acceleration. Allies who come in contact with a mote gain 20% increased movement speed for 30 sec.

Casting an empower spell during Temporal Burst causes a nearby ally to gain a Thread of Fate for 10 sec, granting them a chance to echo their damage or healing spells, dealing 15% of the amount again.
For each damage over time effect from Upheaval, gain 3% haste, up to 9%.
Ebon Might and Prescience gain a chance equal to your critical strike chance to grant 50% additional stats.
Each time you cast an empower spell, unstable time magic reduces its cooldown by up to 6 sec.
Prescience has a 20% chance to cause your next Prescience to last 100% longer.
Empower spells send up to 3 Chrono Flames to your targets.
Reinforce your scales, reducing damage taken by 30%. Lasts 12 sec.
Expunge toxins affecting an ally, removing all Poison effects.
Expunge toxins affecting an ally, removing all Poison effects.
Wing Buffet's cooldown is reduced by 2 min.

Sunder an enemy's protective magic, dealing 915,032 Spellfrost damage to absorb shields.
Azure Strike damages 1 additional enemy.
Swoop to an ally and fly with them to the target location. Clears movement impairing effects from you and your ally.
Green spells restore 10% more health.
Fire Breath causes your next Living Flame to strike 1 additional target per empower level.
Hover gains 1 additional charge.
Deep Breath stuns enemies for 3 sec.

I:   Heals one ally.

II:  Heals a second ally.

III: Heals a third ally.
Essence Burst stacks 2 times.
Stretch time around an ally for the next 8 sec, causing 50% of damage they would take to instead be dealt over 8 sec.

Commune with the Emerald Dream, restoring 20% health and 2% mana every 0.9 sec for 4.5 sec. Overhealing is transferred to an injured ally within 40 yds.

Castable while stunned, disoriented, incapacitated, or silenced.
Spiritbloom's cooldown is reduced by 10 sec.
Your empower spells' maximum level is increased by 1.
Reversion instantly heals the target for 15% of damage taken in the last 5 sec.
Send forward a vortex of temporal energy, absorbing 108,470 damage on you and any allies in its path. Absorption is reduced beyond 5 targets.
Emerald Communion increases your maximum health by 20% for 15 sec.
Increases your maximum Essence to 6.
Echo replicates 50% more healing.
Temporal Anomaly applies Echo at 30% effectiveness to the first 5 allies it passes through.
Verdant Embrace increases the healing of your next Dream Breath by 40%, or your next Living Flame by 100%.
Verdant Embrace temporarily bonds your life with an ally, causing your healing on either partner to heal the other for 40% of the amount. Lasts 5 sec.
Reversion has 2 charges.
Fire Breath heals 5 nearby injured allies for 80% of damage done to up to 5 targets, split evenly among them.

When you or an ally fall below 30% health, a version of yourself enters your timeline and heals them for 558,663. Your alternate self continues healing for 8 sec before returning to their timeline.

May only occur once every 60 sec.
Dream Breath healing is increased by 30%.
Living Flame and Fire Breath deal additional damage and healing equal to 2.0% of your maximum health.
Reversion, Time Dilation, Echo, and Temporal Anomaly last 30% longer and cost 30% less mana.

Hover continues to allow Evoker spells to be cast while moving.

Source of Magic increases the target's healing and damage done by 3%.
Deep Breath stuns enemies for 3 sec.

Increase your 4 nearest allies' primary stat by 5.0% of your own, and cause you to deal 20% more damage, for 10 sec.

May only affect 4 allies at once, and does not affect tanks and healers.

Eruption, Deep Breath, and your empower spells extend the duration of these effects.
Cause a violent eruption beneath an enemy's feet, dealing 282,024 Volcanic damage split between them and nearby enemies.
Your Living Flame has a 20% chance, and your Azure Strike has a 15% chance, to make your next Eruption cost no Essence. Stacks 2 times.
Quell's cooldown is reduced by 20 sec.
Eruption deals 30% more damage per enemy struck, up to 150%.
Essence Burst stacks 2 times.
When cast at an enemy, Living Flame strikes 1 additional enemy for 100% damage.

Gather earthen power beneath your enemy's feet and send them hurtling upwards, dealing 425,306 Volcanic damage to the target and nearby enemies.

Empowering expands the area of effect.

I:   3 yd radius.

II:  6 yd radius.

III: 9 yd radius.

Fly to the targeted location, exposing Temporal Wounds on enemies in your path for 10 sec.

Temporal Wounds accumulate 10% of damage dealt by your allies affected by Ebon Might, then critically strike for that amount as Arcane damage.

Removes all root effects. You are immune to movement impairing and loss of control effects while flying.

Fatal attacks are diverted into a nearby timeline, preventing the damage, and your death, in this one.

The release of temporal energy restores 1.1 million health to you, and 384,321 to 4 nearby allies, over 9 sec. Healing starts high and declines over the duration.

May only occur once every 6 min.
Increases your maximum Essence to 6.
Eruption's Essence cost is reduced by 1.
When allies deal damage with Temporal Wounds, they gain a shield for 100% of the damage dealt. Absorption cannot exceed 30% of your maximum health.

Enchant an ally to appear out of sync with the normal flow of time, reducing threat they generate by 30% for 30 min. Less effective on tank-specialized allies. 

May only be placed on one target at a time.

Protect an ally with 15 explosive dragonscales, increasing their Armor by 20% of your own.

Melee attacks against the target cause 1 scale to explode, dealing 24,173 Volcanic damage to enemies near them. This damage can only occur every few sec.

Blistering Scales can only be placed on one target at a time. Casts on your enemy's target if they have one.

Learn to attune yourself to the essence of the Black or Bronze Dragonflights:

Black Attunement: You and your 4 nearest allies have 2% increased maximum health.

Bronze Attunement:You and your 4 nearest allies have 10% increased movement speed.

Grant an ally the gift of foresight, increasing their critical strike chance by 3% for 18 sec.

Affects the nearest ally within 25 yds, preferring damage dealers, if you do not have an ally targeted.
Upheaval deals 50% increased damage to the primary target, and launches them higher.
When cast, Blistering Scales grants the target a shield that absorbs up to 697,312 damage for 30 sec based on their missing health. Lower health targets gain a larger shield.
Prescience grants the ally a chance for their spells and abilities to echo their damage or healing, dealing 15% of the amount again.
Each time Blistering Scales explodes it deals 15% more damage for 12 sec, stacking 10 times.
Essence Burst has a 20% chance to not be consumed.
Essence Burst reduces the cast time of Eruption by 40%.
Prescience has a 35% chance to grant Essence Burst.
Eruption reduces the remaining cooldown of Upheaval by 1.0 sec.
Deep Breath reduces the Essence cost of Eruption by 1 and increases its damage by 10% for 15 sec after you land.
Surge forward in time, causing your cooldowns to recover 1,000% faster for 2 sec.
Upheaval causes an aftershock at its location, dealing 30% of its damage 2 additional times.
Deep Breath grants you Fury of the Aspects for 15 sec after you land, without causing Exhaustion.
The cooldowns of your spells are reduced by 10%.

Hover now causes you to briefly warp out of existence and appear at your destination. Hover's cooldown is also reduced by 5 sec.

Hover continues to allow Evoker spells to be cast while moving.
Tip the Scales overloads you with temporal energy, increasing your haste, movement speed, and cooldown recovery rate by 30%, decreasing over 30 sec.
Upheaval deals 50% additional damage over 8 sec.
Warp leaves a trail of Motes of Acceleration. Allies who come in contact with a mote gain 20% increased movement speed for 30 sec.

Casting an empower spell during Temporal Burst causes a nearby ally to gain a Thread of Fate for 10 sec, granting them a chance to echo their damage or healing spells, dealing 15% of the amount again.
For each damage over time effect from Upheaval, gain 3% haste, up to 9%.
Ebon Might and Prescience gain a chance equal to your critical strike chance to grant 50% additional stats.
Each time you cast an empower spell, unstable time magic reduces its cooldown by up to 6 sec.
Prescience has a 20% chance to cause your next Prescience to last 100% longer.
Empower spells send up to 3 Chrono Flames to your targets.
Conjure a path of shifting stone towards the target location, rooting enemies for 15 sec. Damage may cancel the effect.
Reinforce your scales, reducing damage taken by 30%. Lasts 12 sec.
Expunge toxins affecting an ally, removing all Poison effects.
Disintegrate channels 20% faster.
Fly to an ally and heal them for 558,663, or heal yourself for the same amount.
Essence regenerates 10% faster.
Obsidian Scales has an additional charge.
Living Flame deals 6% more damage and healing.
Store 20% of your effective healing, up to 171,074. Your next damaging Living Flame consumes all stored healing to increase its damage dealt.
Interrupt an enemy's spellcasting and prevent any spell from that school of magic from being cast for 4 sec.
Your Magic damage done is increased by 4%.
Compress time to make your next empowered spell cast instantly at its maximum empower level.
Your Leech is increased by 4%.
Magic damage taken reduced by 16%.
Your Stamina is increased by 8%.
Hover lasts 4 sec longer.
Fire Breath's damage over time lasts 4 sec longer.
While above 75% health, your movement speed is increased by 10%.
The flames of life surround you for 8 sec. While this effect is active, 100% of damage you take is healed back over 8 sec.
Wing Buffet and Tail Swipe knock enemies further and daze them, reducing movement speed by 70% for 4 sec.
Azure Strike damages 1 additional enemy.
Swoop to an ally and fly with them to the target location. Clears movement impairing effects from you and your ally.
Fire Breath causes your next Living Flame to strike 1 additional target per empower level.
Hover gains 1 additional charge.
Rescue protects you and your ally from harm, absorbing damage equal to 30% of your maximum health for 5 sec.
